Reviews.Title: “Reasonable price, reasonable accommodation”
Reviews.Author: pinktinks81 Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: perfect hen party 14 basic adequate base service blankets required clean towels requested allowed guests change own reasons example ground floor moved ground floor staff helpful providing information various attractions booking taxis looking internet enquiries telephone location centre 15 minutes train station

Reviews.Title: “Basic budget hotel...”
Reviews.Author: maggie m
Reviews.Content: budget hotel pretty basic comfortable sheets towels friendly staff reasonably central location dreadful breakfast especially vegetarian cereal toast pillows helpful flat ones bed extra blanket bedspread nice warm heating nice quiet nights sleepthe en suite dreadful smell 24 climb flights stairs bit challenge

Reviews.Title: “Stag Weekend”
Reviews.Author: a b
Reviews.Content: expected six bed appartment served clean beds pretty comfy ritz ut stag own entrance please

Reviews.Title: “good all round.”
Reviews.Author: stephne c Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: found hotel easily centraal station pleasant welcome hotel throughout stay received breakfast round service hotel staff hotel basic adequate night stay quickly bearings hotel found location conveinient

Reviews.Title: “sub-basement blues”
Reviews.Author: chris c Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: stayed brother week called sub basement storage converted expecting standard hotel disappointing believe worse noticed basement windows windows storage plug sink told none hotel strange hour arriving lady reception banging door accused smoke alarm tried smoke alarms somehow monitored ours tampered imagine sort scare tactic stop people smoking nonsmokers intention doing stunk weed anyway im trying achieve hotel location located near central station easy walk districts hotel

Reviews.Title: “Not bad for the price, very friendly staff!”
Reviews.Author: Lucy D
Reviews.Content: hotel perfect location close central station dam square hotel clean basic staircase steep theres lift suitable people limited mobility paid â£250 3 nights cheap compared hotels arrived hours checkin staff friendly held bags explore returned ready promised breakfast ham cheese bread boiled egg exciting pleasant recommend basic rest

Reviews.Title: “okay, not super clean”
Reviews.Author: Eden K
Reviews.Content: okay budget hotel sheets clean blanket holes bug crawled sheets sleep bedbug didnt care muchthe bathroom clean smelled smoke breakfast included okay

Reviews.Title: “cheap and cheerful but dont expect too much!”
Reviews.Author: Belliiiiita
Reviews.Content: stayed apartment 6 people location central close clubs bars cofee shops shopping spacios nice furniture nicely decorated bad extremely noice night bars downstairs music loud imposible sleep late check 1 little mirrow bathroom little mirrow living

Reviews.Title: “Very good for the price”
Reviews.Author: Gadgetmanuk
Reviews.Content: read negative reviews hotel admit expecting worst pleasantly surprised located easy walking distance central station attractions city offer paid 35 euros night twin sharing breakfast bread boiled egg seen couple slices ham cheese brilliant welcome heavy nights drinking tad smelly told guy reception sorted time clean comfortable bathroom suite looked safe trip mates recommend budget stay amsterdam

Reviews.Title: “Disgusting”
Reviews.Author: CambridgeRuby_roo
Reviews.Content: worst stayed pictures booking site lift surprising climbed flights stairs expected decent wrong smelly dirty carpets curtains hanging windows door handles basic bathroom broken sink broken water stayed smoke alarm covered sock fire escape children horrible

Reviews.Title: “worst hotel I have ever stayed in”
Reviews.Author: chrishelben
Reviews.Content: hotel dire carpets filthy shower cubicle constantly fell apart sheets clean towels clean breakfast boiled eggs probably cooked week kept days staff smoking kitchen avoid costs

Reviews.Title: “Basic - Did the job!”
Reviews.Author: mic_starcross
Reviews.Content: stayed quadruple fit 5 people 3 single beds double bed pretty basic clean pillows bedsheets blankets towels shampoo soap hairdryer provided climb 3 flights stairs top floor hotel interior pretty refurbishment breakfast simple bread toasted boiled egg slices ham cheese jams butter teacoffee location minutes walk amsterdam centraal station close dam square red light district staff helpful store luggage store checkin checkout hotel operates 24hour reception system allowed late nights curfew overall relatively basic simple liked cheaper similar experience staying hostel except city hotel expensive

Reviews.Title: “Brilliant value, nice staff, first class location”
Reviews.Author: drewedmin999
Reviews.Content: ok hotel basic faults dont look hard clean staff nice cheap location ideal 2 minute walk station quiet attractions doorstep 2 9 13 safe idea hotel amsterdam clean base explore city doesnt cost spend money attractions stay expect basic hotel spend money hotel 5 faultless lots faults met expectations paid

Reviews.Title: “good value for money”
Reviews.Author: kikka777
Reviews.Content: hotel basic reflected price clean bed comfortable hotel quiet own bathroom common amsterdam clean shower hotel staff helpful welcoming leave bags checking beacuse plane day breakfast included basic overall value money especially included breakfast own bathroom beware steep stairs common amsterdam main negative decor 70s

Reviews.Title: “ugliest hotel i've ever stayed in”
Reviews.Author: neva08
Reviews.Content: stayed week nights booked thinking pretty traditional website impression cried decor beyond iron curtain shockingly bad staff curteous totally uninterested giving advice rate chinese restaurant didnt hotel jordaan didnt ugly terrible decorative stay

Reviews.Title: “overpriced for what you get”
Reviews.Author: swisstony2
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 2 nights location short walk central station red lights maids kept tidy 24hr reception bad single wardrobe size smelt badly reported staff shook head disbelief breakfast bread toasted told dont toast overpriced

Reviews.Title: “Didn't expect much, and was very disappointed.”

Reviews.Content: location didnt expect 100 eu amsterdam run found lost reservation guy didnt night owes time reception a1 expected linens clean smell bit barely walk standing shade 6 blankets carpet appeared 70s honest effort clean probably 80s window looks onto trash covered interior roof close lock curtains carpet hid view wouldnt return live night settled night bad double bed simply soft saggy sleep covers bit scary single shape fewer hiding watched tiny tv minutes conked sleep quiet credit morning found shower assume lack soap soap dispenser hadnt bend stand front tiny sink probably 58 height limit bathroom shower sink memorable experience obviously splashed water 2x4 bathroom floor hard stepping onto carpet wet feet stand dry wet feet pick breakfast industrial bread 5 slices white 1 wheat 2 slices meat 2 cheese glass orange juice personal service couldnt didnt shower getting late checkout front complaining handed key left beautiful building nice totally inexcusable price hotel
